item.description:
I have closed the poll and the winner is Hugo-3D!

Movie Time:  7:30, I will be at the theater by 6:30.  We will head in for seats a little after 7. 

The movie is showing upstairs, so look for me at the tables in the area by the big windows at the top of the escalator.  I will have on my lovely Meetup pin.

I have been told by a couple of members that this movie was good....also it seems to have received good reviews.

Please update your rsvp if you can no longer make it.

Remember that if you plan on going out with the group after the movie, please bring cash.

Movie Details:

Release Date: November 23, 2011 (3D/2D theaters)
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Director: Martin Scorsese
Screenwriter: John Logan
Starring: Asa Butterfield, Chloe Grace Moretz, Sacha Baron Cohen, Ben Kingsley, Jude Law, Ray Winstone, Christopher Lee, Helen McCrory, Richard Griffiths, Frances de la Tour, Emily Mortimer, Michael Stuhlbarg
Genre: Family, Fantasy, Mystery
MPAA Rating: PG (for mild thematic material, some action/peril and smoking)
Official Website: Hugomovie.com
Review: 8/10 rating
 
Plot Summary: "Hugo" tells the story of an orphan boy living a secret life in the walls of a Paris train station. With the help of an eccentric girl, he searches for the answer to a mystery linking the father he recently lost, the ill-tempered toy shop owner living below him and a heart shaped lock, seemingly without a key. Based on Brian Selznick's award winning and imaginative New York Times bestseller, "The Invention of Hugo Cabret," this magical tale is Academy Award-winner Martin Scorsese's first film shot in 3D.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Hugo 3D (7:30PM Show)
